essentialCookies.heading: Essential cookies
essentialCookies.description: Essential cookies keep your information secure while you use this service. We do not need to ask permission to use them.

heading: Cookies
intro1: Cookies are small files saved on your phone, tablet or computer when you visit a website.
intro2: We use cookies to make '{{ serviceName }}' work and collect information about how you use our service.

crumb.name: Crumb
crumb.purpose: This is an anti-forgery token and is used to prevent cross-site request forgery (CSRF) attacks. It prevents others from forging your website links.

session.name: Session
session.purpose: Saves your responses so you have a better experience.

userSession.name: userSession
userSession.purpose: Used to keep you signed in to the service.
